_xResult.title: Henk Long Linen Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Floor length custom made jacket with front ties
_xResult.longdesc:
This long, elegant linen jacket is made of 100% linen that's been pre-washed and softened. It's perfect to wear in the warmer weather months over skirts, dresses, or pants! Better yet, the medium weight linen fabric is easy to stuff into your bag, as it isn't prone to sloppy-looking wrinkles. 

 

The best features of this jacket are its A-line cut, which is naturally flattering on almost everybody, and its two deep side pockets! Because nothing is worse than a non-functional jacket. 

 

The jacket is available in 31 colors, which you can choose from using the color palette in the last picture. Please provide your color preference during checkout! The color featured in these images is Otter Brown (11). It also comes in a standard length of 53in (135cm), so if you'd like that changed, please indicate it as well.

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees that it meets human-ecological requirements.

hiddenProperties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents. Machine drying in the most gentle way, please use cool temperature. Avoid overdrying.Â  No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
